title: Responsible developer demonstrates quality job creation
description: Responsible developer demonstrates quality job creation
content:
Scenario: Responsible developer demonstrates quality job creation
    Given a responsible developer prioritizes workforce development
    And creates genuine employment opportunities for local residents
    When the Observer documents employment track record
    Then analysis shows: 85% of jobs went to local residents
    And median wage is $24/hour with benefits
    And developer provides apprenticeship programs for construction trades
    And permanent jobs offer career advancement opportunities
    And quality employment becomes competitive advantage for approvals
